task.title: How to Configure MySQL Data Source Drivers

taskbody.context:
To connect to a MySQL server, you need to create a generic JDBC type data source based on the MySQL JDBC driver available on the MySQL website.
To configure this data source, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Click the New button in the Data Sources panel.

stepresult.p: The dialog box for configuring a data source is opened.

fig.title: Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box
Data Source Drivers Configuration Dialog Box

step.cmd: Select Generic JDBC in the driver Type drop-down list.
Add the MySQL driver files using the Add Files button.
step.info: The driver file for the MySQL server is called mysql-com.jar. The Driver files section lists download links for database drivers that are necessary for accessing MySQL databases in .

step.cmd: Continue on to configure your MySQL connection.
